text.text: Here is a list of things *fornut* responds to:

elements.text: Train or descry the _Feural Fetworkâ„¢_: github.com/forma-ai/FordoraAi
*Disclaimer*: fornut is not responsible for randomness. (Fisher-Yates shuffle algorithm)

text.text: *!fornut*: randomly group all users of the sent-from channel.
*!pick*: randomly pick a user from the sent-from channel.

elements.text: Optionally pass a list to pick from instead. e.g.: !pick [a,b,c]
